body.p: This clinical statement represents the anticipated date when a woman will give birth.

p.b: Estimated Date Of Delivery Observation example

body.codeblock: <entryRelationship typeCode="REFR"> <!-- Estimated date of Delivery entry --> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.1" /> <code code="11778-8" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Estimated delivery date" /> <statusCode code="completed" /> <value xsi:type="TS" value="20090215" /> </observation> </entryRelationship>
